name: Clock Room
description:
Welcome to Clock Room!

Incremental game where the time is literally money but with a small twist. Buy upgrades get out of the room by strange gate and set yourself free from all that work you needed to do on time... If you love incrementals that are short and similar to Cookie Clicker, Antimatter Dimensions and Universal Paperclips definitely give my game a shot.

You can mod this game! For tutorial how to make mods and load them check out this

Play Clock Room on my official website here

Play my other incremental game "Time Tickle" here

A paid standalone exe version of the game will be available.
